website_summaries.verdict: Nice price to receive a large number of baseballs for practice or games.
pros: Handy bucket for carrying a large number of baseballs to practice or game locations
Each bucket contains three dozen baseballs
Full grain leather baseballs will hold up well under stress of repeated practice sessions
Slightly raised seams allow for a good grip on the ball
cons: Some potential problems with quality control and accurate shipping

customer_reviews.title: Several baseballs arrived damaged
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two buckets and one was open in the box At least five of the baseballs were warped, damaged, and would not be "game ball" quality. Wilson wouldn't help since I bought through Amazon. Amazon won't provide support, but only will have me return my entire purchase. Seems unnecessary for 5-10 baseballs out of the six dozen. Would be helpful if someone would simply help me replace the baseballs that were damaged.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Loomer

customer_reviews.title: Not 3 dozen - Arrived 1 dozen - Smaller than Regulation Size
customer_reviews.text: The package arrived quickly. However the bucket inside of the package was open. Inside of the package was supposed to be 3 dozen, instead there was only 1 dozen. The description of the item says 3 dozen, but the title says 1 dozen. My mistake for thinking $130 would be 3 dozen baseballs. The next issue is that that the balls themselves are 3mm smaller then a regulation ball. This was measured up to a Cal Ripken ball. Even if the price was correct or they could send me a replacement package with the 3 dozen balls I wouldn't keep these due to size any way.
customer_reviews.author: suzanne greene

customer_reviews.title: Great Baseballs
customer_reviews.text: Apparently they are blems but you would never know. The balls are individually wrapped in the bucket and all look pretty close to perfect to me. After a month of infield and BP twice a week in dry conditions they are still white and hardly show any wear (nothing major). They still pop off the bat like they did new. I've used the other major name brand for a while, and they were good, but they seemed to soften up a lot after about a month of heavy use. These balls keep on trucking. Very satisfied and have found my new practice balls from here on out.
customer_reviews.author: Boxador

customer_reviews.title: Solid balls for pitching practice
customer_reviews.text: My son is a sophomore college pitcher. He purchased a well known brand of balls for practice and hated them. Flat seams and synthetic cover does not allow for a good grip and working on breaking pitches. I bought a dozen of Wilson 1030s for him to try and he really likes them. Pretty durable practice ball. (Note: Pitching is far less abusive to baseballs than hitting.) He really likes the way they feel. He caught a Rawlings Pro ball at a MLB game a couple years, he compares the feel to that. Will purchase more when these wear out.
customer_reviews.author: Really Distracted

customer_reviews.title: What I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these baseballs just to get on the field and hit fly balls with friends and family. These are good quality and feel nice off the bat. The flight is good. I have had a tough time picking baseballs online and have definitely made some bad choices. I will definitely purchase these again!
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Schinkel

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money by far.
customer_reviews.text: These are great balls. Feel and hit really well. Bucket is good quality. For the price they provide more than enough training balls for my son to do all drills. He pitches off his mound in the yard and doesnt have to reload so frequently. He can hit two buckets and be done. Etc. Very nice set.
customer_reviews.author: vader08

customer_reviews.title: A Must Buy!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I read a lot of reviews but rarely write one myself. Just came back from the cages with my 11 year old. It is amazing how a good quality ball can boost a players confidence. No more buying the junk Dick's balls. These Wilson balls will be all I use going forward. Great quality and great pop off the bat. Glad I found them and will definately buy more in the future. Great product!! Highly recommended....
customer_reviews.author: Christina Long

customer_reviews.title: Great value on a great baseball
customer_reviews.text: Great value on a great baseball. Description indicated that these are "blems", but I couldn't tell. They look, feel, and play like every other Wilson 1030. Would, and likely will, buy again. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff O

customer_reviews.title: Great for BP
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my high school aged son to use for BP. We have used them around 4 days a week for a couple of month and they have held up pretty good. Will buy another bucket next summer.
customer_reviews.author: S Duval

customer_reviews.title: Nice, high/seam leather balls for practice at attractive price
customer_reviews.text: Great deal. The balls were all individually wrapped in great shape, have held up well to light hitting/heavy pitching practice, and the bucket is solid. These balls have nice high seams so not great for pitching machines. This save more for pitchers to practice with.
customer_reviews.author: Shooter

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: These Wilson baseballs are dependable for both throwing and hitting. The raised stitching is great for control when our young players improve their throwing and pitching. They hold up well for batting.
customer_reviews.author: Soapcreek

customer_reviews.title: Good for batting practice
customer_reviews.text: Cork balls. OK for batting practice. Better than expected since the description says Grade C leather. I’m happy with these balls for BP.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: a name you can trust
customer_reviews.text: Over the years we have tried different brands but we have always found Wilson to be the best. I love the bucket for easy storage of all the baseballs.
customer_reviews.author: Nadine Bookaholic [Nadine's Obsessed with Books]

customer_reviews.title: The Wilson 1030 Baseball is a good quality baseball
customer_reviews.text: We are using the Wilson 1030 for weekly practice. It is a durable baseball. We are happy with the quality and the purchase. Will order more as needed.
customer_reviews.author: DG

customer_reviews.title: Best bang for buck.
customer_reviews.text: These have held up well. Hold their shape after hitting practice/tee work. Seams are a little higher than a mlb ball, but not finger blistering like some diamonds.
customer_reviews.author: Vfrjo

customer_reviews.title: Nice BP Baseballs
customer_reviews.text: Our dozen arrived in great condition with only a few very minor blemishes on a couple of balls. We have had about 5 rounds of BP with them so far and they are holding up great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not usually picky, but these are not real baseballs.  Buy Cal Ripken LL Balls instead.
customer_reviews.text: They do not play or fell like real baseballs. Much more like "official size" balls. Not even good enough for practice.
customer_reviews.author: SummerShhh

customer_reviews.title: Best value on the market
customer_reviews.text: These are great! Comes individually wrapped and look awesome! My son loves them and it’s nice throwing BP with new baseballs
customer_reviews.author: Austin Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with purchase
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this bucket of balls for my 8th grader...mainly for hitting in cage. After a month of hitting 3-4 times per week the balls still look new. Large bucket is sturdy and can actually fit a lot more balls if desired. The shipping was right on time and everything arrived as expected. I would definitely purchase again as needed.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Gregory

customer_reviews.title: Price
customer_reviews.text: For my sons baseball team. Great price. Theses are the best practice baseballs.
customer_reviews.author: Raine

customer_reviews.title: Decent balls.  Raised seams good for action on the ball.
customer_reviews.text: I gave three stars because some of the balls had loose strings after only one use.
customer_reviews.author: HerMan

customer_reviews.title: They'reeeee Great!
customer_reviews.text: Some minor blemishes like describe but the balls are amazing for batting practice. I am a Simi pro baseball player and my son and I both use these and they hold up very well. Best bang for the buck for baseballs by far!
customer_reviews.author: tyler willey

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Sons and I have been very happy with the quality of these baseballs. Much better for pitching.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: These balls make a nice ping off the bat
customer_reviews.text: If these are blems the blems are hard to find. These balls make a nice ping off the bat, and travel much farther than the cork balls. My son hits them off the tee and from being pitched to. Will purchase again when needed.
customer_reviews.author: Lonnie Shewman

customer_reviews.title: Balls were fine but bucket was defective
customer_reviews.text: Bucket arrived without a handle - super disappointed that they would send an OBVIOUSLY DEFECTIVE product. I needed balls for baseball team so I did not return it. However, the only way to get it replaced was to do so. Be careful with this product and leave yourself enough time to return it.
customer_reviews.author: William Wayne Bickel

customer_reviews.title: Excellent practice balls
customer_reviews.text: I use these balls for practice and so far they are great. I don't use them in wet conditions but they seem to handle the grass and dirt very well. I'm not sure how well they would handle game conditions.
customer_reviews.author: theRIP

customer_reviews.title: Good balls
customer_reviews.text: Great balls for the money. I coach my sons 14u team and we recently had a game where due to a miscommunication between the umps they didn’t have any game balls. So I gave them a couple of these balls. They lasted the whole game no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy Grandson
customer_reviews.text: They were not for me they were a Christmas gift for my grandson. I had to ask his dad what kind to get. Those are what he plays with so that is what I got. Logan was very excited to get them.He plays on travel teams and will make great use of them.
customer_reviews.author: A.Ray Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Best baseballs made!!
customer_reviews.text: My 11u ball team goes through tons of balls, these are the best around!!
customer_reviews.author: R. Sturdivant

customer_reviews.title: Great Balls for a Great Price
customer_reviews.text: I generally don’t write reviews, but these balls are very nice for the price. Some of the leather may be slightly wrinkled on them or the stamps may not be perfect but other than that they were great and I would definitely buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Heather F.

customer_reviews.title: Bucket of pearls
customer_reviews.text: Maybe a little pricey for 3 dozen, but along with the bucket overall it's a good deal. Baseballs are great, smell great too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bucket of Baseballs
customer_reviews.text: All Baseballs individually wrapped. Perfect for what we needed, balls to hit off a tee in the garage.
customer_reviews.author: Brian M.

customer_reviews.title: Nice bunch 'o balls. Handy bucket too
customer_reviews.text: A great bucket of balls. lots of room to get another bunch of balls. If these balls are blemished balls, I just don't see the point of individually wrapping each ball in plastic, however.
customer_reviews.author: Pico Parrot

customer_reviews.title: Missing 3 balls
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 3 dozen, one of the boxes was missing 3 balls and two of the balls in another box are blemished, pretty disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Will buy again
customer_reviews.text: Good quality baseballs! Not cheap that misform after a few hits.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: Nice balls I used for them for practice every week and they do a pretty good job
customer_reviews.author: Jay Torres

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied with the quality of these baseballs
customer_reviews.text: For the price the quality of balls was better than I expected. Very satisfied, would recommend to others and will order these again when more are needed.
customer_reviews.author: Robert E. Hammack

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great value, great condition for blems, perfect for practice, good enough for games.
customer_reviews.author: Phil Whitener

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: Cheaper than buying at retail stores and these baseballs are great quality. Bought for my son's 11u travel team practices and are great.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: The A1030 is just a great baseball. Pretty durable
customer_reviews.text: The A1030 is just a great baseball. Pretty durable, great laces, great leather. They are hard baseballs. They make a great game ball and then transitioning to a practice ball.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: I bought five of these buckets for my 10-year-old’s team. Good quality baseballs for the price. I will buy again
customer_reviews.author: Kirkland K Chewning

customer_reviews.title: Best baseballs. Not worth it buying Easton baseballs
customer_reviews.text: Best baseballs. Not worth it buying Easton baseballs, these are the real deal. Hold up very nicely during strong pitching practice.
customer_reviews.author: Usman Khan

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Received the balls very quick. Have used them several times already for batting practice with my 14 year old son. The balls are of very good quality and have a good "pop" off the bat. Would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves these buckets for his teams. No issues-
customer_reviews.author: MaS

customer_reviews.title: Blemished baseballs
customer_reviews.text: These are all blemished baseballs so stay away from them if you aren’t looking blems. I wouldn’t have purchased these had I known.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Baseballs!!
customer_reviews.text: These are nice baseballs that were used from my son's baseball team. I believe these were in better condition than the game balls we had to use. Kids loved them and they felt good in the hand. Highly recommend them when they are on sale.
customer_reviews.author: T. Weaver

customer_reviews.title: Not 1 dozen, only 1
customer_reviews.text: The ball itself is fine, but only one was sent. The description says 1 dozen, but it is only one baseball. Disappointing. Should be corrected.
customer_reviews.author: LD

customer_reviews.title: 1030A
customer_reviews.text: Have had these 1030a balls for a few months and everyday bp between my 2 kids, they have held up nice and expected. Will be purchasing again
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: Short shipment $42/ball
customer_reviews.text: Ordered multiple dozen based on reviews and received 1 ball. Do not purchase!
customer_reviews.author: bjack0013

customer_reviews.title: 36 Wilson A1030 balls/bucket
customer_reviews.text: Great set of practice balls, really pop off the bat. These are harder/denser balls not the cork ones that feel dead
customer_reviews.author: Dustin adams

customer_reviews.title: Good Deal!!
customer_reviews.text: These are great baseballs for little league practice. Came quickly and each ball individually packaged in a large 5 gallon pale with a padded cover which acts as a seat. I would recommend these. Price was also very competitive.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Great value and the balls have good pop
customer_reviews.text: Great value and the balls have good pop. I'd say they react off the bat 90-95% of a "game" or "tournament" ball.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew C

customer_reviews.title: 👎🏽
customer_reviews.text: A bucket of baseballs is six dozen. This product should not be advertised as a bucket and it is overpriced for what it is
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Dalton

customer_reviews.title: Play ball!
customer_reviews.text: Well made baseballs at a fraction of the cost. These are the real deal but have blemishes. They are perfect for practice.
customer_reviews.author: W. S. Patterson

customer_reviews.title: great deal, balls very good
customer_reviews.text: great deal, balls very good, does not have a ussij logo. Love the bucket saves my butt while sitting putting balls on the tee for a hour.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Days!

customer_reviews.title: Get your money's worth
customer_reviews.text: Not too many blems, great for BP and for practice. Raised seam.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They have held up great!
customer_reviews.text: They have held up great in the cage. We have used them a couple dozen rounds of hitting.
customer_reviews.author: Steven W Bitzer

customer_reviews.title: Nice baseballs for practice
customer_reviews.text: Cosmetic blems which you can't find on the balls and after 1 session in the cage it won't matter. These are first rate balls and hold up nicely to the punishment of batting cages and fielding drills. These have a cork center with a felt winding and a real leather cover. Don't buy the cheap ones with a synthetic cover that are all cork and rubber on the inside, They don't "hit" or "throw" the same. The bucket with the padded lid is a nice throw in but just for the balls it's a pretty good deal. Arrived in three days with the free shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Canonsburgmike

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: Very nice balls for little league or higher. The leather is tight on the balls. Does not seem to be the wrinkled, subpar leather that would likely be found on balls in this price range. This a great deal.
customer_reviews.author: CrossWood

customer_reviews.title: Baseballs
customer_reviews.text: These are exactly what I expected and they arrived in perfect shape, all individually wrapped. The raised seems are perfect to throw batting practice as it is easier to grip and throw them. This comes in especially handy on rainy days. The buck is also strong enough to sit on.
customer_reviews.author: Independent

customer_reviews.title: Great Practice baseballs
customer_reviews.text: Great BP baseballs! Fast shipping! Will definitely order again. 13U travel baseball coach
customer_reviews.author: Michael DeMatteo

customer_reviews.title: Count your balls!
customer_reviews.text: I recently ordered a bucket which was supposed to come with 3 dozen balls. Only had 33.
customer_reviews.author: Chris W

customer_reviews.title: Great Baseballs
customer_reviews.text: Love these baseballs, they are great for our 10u team and last much longer than the competitors!
customer_reviews.author: R. Sturdivant

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Product fits as intended and the price was awesome and arrived a expected.
customer_reviews.author: Gianni

customer_reviews.title: Great birthday gift.
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Individually wrapped baseballs. My son enjoyed unwrapping each one as a birthday gift.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay Renee

customer_reviews.title: Great Baseballs
customer_reviews.text: A great baseball at a great price. These ball are used during high school play. I highly recommend you doing your research as you will not find a ball of this quality much cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: mpoillucci

customer_reviews.title: Great balls
customer_reviews.text: Great for pitching, hitting, practice in general. Good seams. Seem durable thus far.
customer_reviews.author: Stuart Fischer

customer_reviews.title: Good Senior League Ball
customer_reviews.text: Good Ball if purchased at the right price. Target Price should be $35-$40 for New
customer_reviews.author: cabbage

customer_reviews.title: Value for money JH and High School Baseballs
customer_reviews.text: I buy baseballs for our annual youth (13-15) baseball tournament, and these are excellent value-for-money baseballs (esp. when bought via Amazon by the dozen or the 3-dozen bucket!). The seams are sufficiently raised that beginning breaking ball pitchers will find that they can put some spin on their curves. Experiments with other cheaper brands resulted in too many dead balls or inconsistent liveliness. The Wilsons are consistent: recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Bradley West

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Blems!
customer_reviews.text: Can't wait till another set becomes available!! Blems! Yeah, maybe one blem. Great deal. Perfect for hitting and pitching. My ten year old loves the seems!
customer_reviews.author: pnlek5150

customer_reviews.title: I'm fine with that
customer_reviews.text: Of the 36 balls in the bucket.. only 1 had a noticeable blemish. I'm fine with that.. these are great balls for Little League, both for practice and game balls.
customer_reviews.author: Micco

customer_reviews.title: Great quality balls and have held up throughout the year
customer_reviews.text: Great quality balls and have held up throughout the year. Going to be purchasing some additional balls for the spring too 2018. 1030's with small blemishes that you can't even notice or tell. Thanks Wilson.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle C Gutter

customer_reviews.title: No major defects, arrived as advertised
customer_reviews.text: As advertised. Didn't see any major defects. No Complaints. Good value.
customer_reviews.author: D. Chesser

customer_reviews.title: Good practice balls
customer_reviews.text: I'd give the ball a 5 star, but the seams are messed up on 2 out of 12. Good practice balls.
customer_reviews.author: John Pickert

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for the price point
customer_reviews.text: We'll be buying a few more buckets. Great quality for the price point.
customer_reviews.author: SarahM

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Balls arrived when they said they would be here. NICE balls to practice with. Feels good in your hands and has nice pop off the bat. We were using junk balls before for practice that hit like a sponge. As soon as I started pitching these to my 12 year old he finally put a couple over the fence. 9 to be exact. I would and more than likely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Garst

customer_reviews.title: Great ball
customer_reviews.text: Great balls Last a long time I use as game balls for my 11u team.
customer_reviews.author: T. A.

customer_reviews.title: 6 gallon bucket
customer_reviews.text: These buckets have a little heavier duty handle that your average 5 gallon bucket. They come with a cool lid that has 1/2" built in pad on it.
customer_reviews.author: John in Tennessee

customer_reviews.title: I am satisfied with the quality of these balls
customer_reviews.text: I am satisfied with the quality of these balls. The bucket is also of good quality.The only negative was there were only 35 balls in the bucket.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin P. Conley

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: best practice balls for the price . Not synthetic leather
customer_reviews.author: frank

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good deal, good product. 3 stars due to being shipped only 34 instead of the 36 baseballs as described.
customer_reviews.author: PN

customer_reviews.title: Great balls and will use tonight for my select
customer_reviews.text: All 36 balls came in individual plastic. Great balls and will use tonight for my select team
customer_reviews.author: keegan

customer_reviews.title: ... with wood bats and if these baseballs were not good there would not be a crack on impact
customer_reviews.text: we hit with wood bats and if these baseballs were not good there would not be a crack on impact. Well we got a lot of crack on impact and they flew a long ways and they came in a nice bucket for collection.
customer_reviews.author: Don Baker

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality Balls
customer_reviews.text: These balls are great for little league. They held up through an entire season of practices. They look and feel great.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: They've held up great. Good feel to the ball; good laces. They don't have that plasticy feel i've come to expect with cheap balls. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Good Baseballs
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for practice, and they have performed fine. Quality balls at a good price.
customer_reviews.author: R. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Products!  Great value
customer_reviews.text: Best bang for the buck around for the balls you get.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent buy. Great quality baseballs. Love the leather! hours of fun with the kids on the bball diamond
customer_reviews.author: jimmy john

customer_reviews.title: Not real hard balls
customer_reviews.text: These have a cork which makes the ball jump off the bat. I am disappointed becasue I wanted to get a true "hard ball" feel but this ball is not it. Feels like you can actually squeeze them a bit.
customer_reviews.author: narjit

customer_reviews.title: Quality baseballs
customer_reviews.text: These are quality baseballs folk so don't worry about ordering them. They have held up well through alot of practices already.
customer_reviews.author: AllenW

customer_reviews.title: Greta Bucket
customer_reviews.text: These are great. What I was expecting. Baseballs are getting expensive, these seemed to be the best value for themoney.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Item description is not correct. It says A1010's and what i received is all A1030's.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very affordable choice
customer_reviews.text: My husband bought these for his amateur baseball league. Great practice balls, very affordable. They shipped fast and we didn't find even one defective ball in the lot. Would highly reccommend to anyone who is looking for an economical choice for practice balls.
customer_reviews.author: None_None

customer_reviews.title: Great Baseballs
customer_reviews.text: I was always a Diamond guy and was a bit apprehensive about buying these wilson balls. However, I read a bunch of reviews and thought I'd try them out with my 12 year old. Good for BP or in the field. The bucket is a nice touch as well. Will order more.
customer_reviews.author: R. Cantor

customer_reviews.title: Great practice balls
customer_reviews.text: Bought this along with the Blue Flame Pitching Machine and they work great. Good value and these balls have held up well under extensive batting practice drills.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Oden

customer_reviews.title: As expected
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for some good BP balls that came with a bucket that I could sit on. Found these 1030 balls for a good price...everything is as expected! Good balls and a decent bucket
customer_reviews.author: Sabrmc

customer_reviews.title: These are great, have bought a few of these 3 dozen
customer_reviews.text: These are great, have bought a few of these 3 dozen. Very hard to find a blemish even if you're looking. Might find one or two with slightly wrinkled leather here or there but very usable for cage/practice/scrimmages. We've used them as game balls even in situations where we lost our league-given balls due to homeruns/foul balls in trees.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Price - Good quality - Will buy again!
customer_reviews.text: Nephew will love these. Came with 36 individually wrapped balls, good quality bucket with Wilson wrote in yellow on side, and a foam covered lid. These fill up half the bucket. Would make great stocking stuffers for a baseball team. Have not thrown them around or hit them yet.
customer_reviews.author: A B

customer_reviews.title: These balls are super hard and when my 9 year olds first started ...
customer_reviews.text: These balls are super hard and when my 9 year olds first started hitting them with their bats they said it hurt their hands. They have since gotten used to it. If you're looking for slightly softer balls this is NOT it. It worked though.
customer_reviews.author: Monarchcx

customer_reviews.title: Solid travel grade baseball. We use these baseball for ...
customer_reviews.text: Solid travel grade baseball. We use these baseball for all of our teams with the exception of our high school teams. We use the Rawlings official MLB at the high school level. Otherwise the Wilson A1030 is the only ball we use.
customer_reviews.author: Doug McCoy

product_meta.title: Wilson Champion Series Baseballs (One Dozen)
feature_bullets: Grade C/D full grain leather cover
